name: Assemblance
description:
Only through communication are the players able to break down the barriers and have a better understanding of what each other are dealing with.

Premise

Grab a friend and solve levels in a communication-based co-op puzzler.  Reality is split between dimensions: one 2D and the other 3D.

You can see environment on your friend's half of the screen, but not your own (other than a ping of your position). To forge the way forward, describe the map to each other and pass items back and forth between each other. Unlock the path to reunite with each other and reconnect both worlds!

Controls

Each player moves their character with the [WASD] or arrow keys.

Press [E] to pick up items. Then press [Space] to throw them. You can also press [Q] to drop them.

You cannot cross the halfway barrier between the two worlds, but items may.
